$description: Accordion component tokens. Accordions organize content into collapsible sections, reducing visual clutter. These tokens compose primitive tokens into accordion-specific configurations. Use accordions for: FAQs, settings panels, navigation menus, content-heavy pages. ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure proper aria-expanded state, keyboard navigation with arrow keys, and Home/End key support.

horizontal.$description: Header horizontal padding (16px). Comfortable click target with room for text and chevron icon.

vertical.$description: Header vertical padding (12px). Balanced spacing for readable header text.

fontSize.$description: Header font size (16px). Standard body size for section headers. Readable without competing with page headings.

fontWeight.$description: Header font weight. Medium weight provides subtle emphasis distinguishing headers from body content.

horizontal.$description: Content horizontal padding (16px). Matches header horizontal padding for visual alignment.

vertical.$description: Content vertical padding (12px). Comfortable reading space for body content.

borderWidth.$description: Accordion item border width (1px). Thin separators between accordion items.

borderRadius.$description: Accordion container border radius (4px). Subtle rounding for the outer container.

size.$description: Chevron icon size (16px). Proportional to header text for visual balance.

duration.$description: Chevron rotation duration (200ms). Matches content expand/collapse timing.

easing.$description: Chevron rotation easing. Smooth rotation for natural open/close motion.

gap.$description: Gap between accordion items (0). Items are flush with borders providing separation. Set to a spacing token for separated variant.
